member.name: M:PogoloDataProvider.Data.GridViewExcelExport.Export(System.String,System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView)
member.summary: Parse a GridView control and render it as an Excel file.

member.name: M:PogoloDataProvider.Data.ExcelADO.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Requires a server-bound copy of the spreadsheet.
member.param: System (not web) path to Excel file.

member.name: M:PogoloDataProvider.Data.ExcelADO.ExecuteQuery(System.String,System.Type)
member.summary: Run a SQL-style query on an Excel spreadsheet.
member.param:
Such as:
"Select * FROM [SKUs$]" - Selects all columns in a specified worksheet
Select ID,Name FROM RangeName" - Selects specified columns from a previously defined range.
member.returns: ArrayList of the object type you passed in.
member.remarks: Uses "Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0" data provider for Excel access.
